description:
Lightweight replacement of Lenovo Vantage for Lenovo Legion laptops.

Lenovo Legion Toolkit (LLT) is a utility created for Lenovo Legion laptops, that allows changing a couple of features that are only available in Lenovo Vantage or Legion Zone.
What's Changed
- Fix device compatibility, GPU sensor reporting, and related UI behavior by @hoaug-tran in https://github.com/XKaguya/LenovoLegionToolkit/pull/148
- Add support for Vantage Color Boost in Aurora keyboard backlight settings by @WalterWoshid in https://github.com/XKaguya/LenovoLegionToolkit/pull/157
- Improved Floating Gadget functionality.
- Added Argument Window for enhanced user experience.
- Implemented check before hibernate; to prevent unexpected behavior.
- Attempted to fix abnormal restart issues for enhanced overclocking stability.
- Refactored code to improve compatibility and optimize sensor logic.
- Added support for Legion 5 Pro 16ADR10.
- Restored display of system fan controls for supported devices that were previously hidden unexpectedly.
- Merged Game Mode and Custom Engine into a unified listener.
- Canceled profile application when AC power is not connected to prevent improper configuration.
- Fixed missing elements in the dashboard page.
- Reworked Dashboard Customization features for improved usability.
- Fixed an issue where the FloatingGadget Custom window did not adhere to theme settings.
- Fixed an issue where CPU Core Frequency was not hidden on hybrid architecture systems.
- Added CheckInstance validation to the Run Automation Step for improved reliability.
- Added AMD PBO Overclocking (enable by clicking Device Info â†’ BIOS Version 5 times).
- Added 24-zone RGB support for 16IAX10 and 16IRX10 models.
- Added Extreme Mode support for LOQ 15IRH8.
- Added Dashboard support for ThinkBook and related models.
- Added SpeakerVolume automation step and FloatingGadget "Toggle" action.
- Enabled second-level interval support for Periodic Actions.
- Updated StatusWindow style to respect the UseNewDashboard toggle.
- Dynamically hide OverDrive and System Fan controls for unsupported devices.
- Shortened internal queue interval for improved responsiveness.
- Fixed fan curve adjustment issue for Legion 9 IAX10H (NX).
- Fixed hibernation wake-up crash on ThinkBook devices.
- Fixed DpiScaleFeature availability issue.
- Fixed an issue where laptop wake up from hibernate will restore to Quiet mode.
- LLT will now auto switch language when first launch.
New Contributors
- @hoaug-tran made their first contribution in https://github.com/XKaguya/LenovoLegionToolkit/pull/148
- @WalterWoshid made their first contribution in https://github.com/XKaguya/LenovoLegionToolkit/pull/157
